name: Chocolate Bar 100%
description: Pure chocolate, crafted directly from fine aroma cocoa. Intense and authentic flavor, perfect for cocoa lovers in its most natural form.

name: Chocolate Bar with Cocoa Nibs and Sea Salt
description: 65% chocolate with toasted cocoa nibs and a touch of sea salt. Crunchy and perfectly balanced between sweet and salty.

name: Chocolate Bar with Coffee
description: 65% chocolate with coffee, made with high-altitude coffee beans from Palanda. Perfect to start the day with energy and rich aroma.

name: Bonbons with Exotic Fruit Filling
description: Bonbons filled with local and exotic fruits. A sweet and fruity combination that highlights the richness of the Amazon.

name: Natural Cocoa Nibs
description: Toasted cocoa nibs, pure and natural. Perfect as a healthy snack, for baking, or to enhance desserts.

name: Sweet Cocoa Liqueur (20°)
description: Artisanal liqueur, smooth and sweet. Ideal to enjoy and share.

name: Cocoa Cocktail (12°)
description: Smooth, sweet, and refreshing beverage. Best enjoyed chilled, perfect for special gatherings.
